ai-tha-ap53:1.4_0: the poised one, the perfected one;
ai-tha-ap53:2.2_0: Having raised my joined palms to him:
ai-tha-ap53:3.3_0: if it is a peaceful mendicant Saṅgha;
ai-tha-ap53:4.1_0: “This is the source of this seed!
ai-tha-ap53:4.4_0: It doesn’t go to the underworld.’
ai-tha-ap53:6.1_0: I stood at one hundred thousand times.
ai-tha-ap53:6.3_0: And the sixteen kings presented him.
ai-tha-ap53:7.3_0: I’ve realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
ai-tha-ap53:8.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Vijayā.
ai-tha-ap53:9.1_0: First the Elder Vijayans’ lady first,
